pageContext.claim: “You've all heard my speeches. I never said repeal it and replace it within 64 days. I have a long time.”
pageContext.analysis: He repeatedly pledged he'd start the repeal process on "day one" and that the repeal would be immediate. In a January 2017 interview, he said an Obamacare repeal vote would happen before his inauguration and replacement wold come “very quickly or simultaneously, very shortly thereafter.”
